content: क्षणः, --णं [क्षणोति दुःखं क्षण्-अच्] {@--1@} An instant, moment, measure of time equal to 4/5 of a second; क्षणमात्रमृषिस्तस्थौ सुप्तमीन इव ह्रदः <ls>R. 1. 73</ls>; <ls n="R.">2. 60</ls>; <ls>Me. 26</ls>; क्षणमवतिष्ठस्व wait a moment. {@--2@} Leisure; अहमपि लब्धक्षणः स्वगेहं गच्छामि <ls>M. 1</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 138</ls>; गृहीतः क्षणः <ls>Ś. 2</ls> ‘my leisure is at your disposal’ {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} I pledge my word to do your work. {@--3@} A fit moment or opportunity; रहो नास्ति क्षणो नास्ति नास्ति प्रार्थयिता नरः <ls>Pt. 1. 138</ls>; <ls>Me. 62</ls>; अधिगतक्षणः <ls>Dk. 147.</ls> {@--4@} An auspicious or lucky moment. {@--5@} A festival, joy, delight. {@--6@} Dependence, servitude. {@--7@} The centre, the middle. {@--8@} A certain day of the fortnight (as the full moon). (In <ab>comp.</ab> क्षण is translated by ‘momentary’, ‘temporary.’ क्षणात्, --क्षणेन in a moment, at once, immediately).
